snippet.title: First preview! NEW top-down space shooter survival action game! Can't wait!
snippet.description:
███████████ is a top-down arcade space shooter with survivor & roguelite elements.

Fight off alien invaders. Guns, items, skills. Survive & rid the Planetary Shield of the alien infestation.

No Steam page yet. Get our newsletter instead! 
More info at biodome[dot]games
